mapper.select: SELECT USR_NO ,RSRV_VSTN ,RSRV_NO ,FCLT_MGMT_NO ,CNCL_YN ,ENTP_NM ,WRKR_NM ,CNCL_DTT ,WRK_CNTT ,REG_DTT ,UPD_DTT ,REG_ID ,UPD_ID FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV WHERE RSRV_NO = #{RSRV_NO}

SELECT R.USR_NO ,R.RSRV_VSTN ,R.RSRV_NO ,R.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,R.CNCL_YN ,R.ENTP_NM ,R.WRKR_NM ,R.CNCL_DTT ,R.WRK_CNTT ,R.REG_DTT ,R.UPD_DTT ,R.REG_ID ,R.UPD_ID ,F.FCLT_NM ,D.RSRV_DT ,D.TZ_TP_CD ,D.RSRV_DTL_NO ,H.VST_NO ,C.CHK_CNTT ,H.CHKIN_DTT ,H.CHKIN_CNFMR ,H.CHKOUT_DTT ,H.CHKOUT_CNFMR FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV R INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D on D.RSRV_NO = R.RSRV_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT F on F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = R.FCLT_MGMT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_VST_HIST H on H.RSRV_DTL_NO = D.RSRV_DTL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_CHK C on C.VST_NO = H.VST_NO WHERE D.RSRV_DT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{date},'%') AND R.FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{facilityiesNo} AND D.CNCL_YN='N'

SELECT
count(R.RSRV_NO)
FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV R INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D on D.RSRV_NO = R.RSRV_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT F on F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = R.FCLT_MGMT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_VST_HIST H on H.RSRV_DTL_NO = D.RSRV_DTL_NO WHERE R.USR_NO =#{userNo} AND D.CNCL_YN='N'

SELECT R.USR_NO ,R.RSRV_VSTN ,R.RSRV_NO ,R.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,R.CNCL_YN ,R.ENTP_NM ,R.WRKR_NM ,R.CNCL_DTT ,R.WRK_CNTT ,R.REG_DTT ,R.UPD_DTT ,R.REG_ID ,R.UPD_ID ,D.RSRV_DT ,D.TZ_TP_CD ,D.RSRV_DTL_NO ,U.USR_ID ,U.CPHN ,H.VST_NO ,F.FCLT_NM ,C.CHK_CNTT ,H.CHKIN_DTT ,H.CHKIN_CNFMR ,H.CHKOUT_DTT ,H.CHKOUT_CNFMR FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV R INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D on D.RSRV_NO = R.RSRV_NO INNER JOIN TB_USR U on R.USR_NO = U.USR_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT F on F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = R.FCLT_MGMT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_VST_HIST H on H.RSRV_DTL_NO = D.RSRV_DTL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_CHK C on C.VST_NO = H.VST_NO WHERE D.RSRV_DTL_NO = #{reserveDetailNo} AND R.RSRV_NO = #{reserveNo}

SELECT R.USR_NO ,R.RSRV_VSTN ,R.RSRV_NO ,R.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,R.CNCL_YN ,R.ENTP_NM ,R.WRKR_NM ,R.CNCL_DTT ,R.WRK_CNTT ,R.REG_DTT ,R.UPD_DTT ,R.REG_ID ,R.UPD_ID ,D.RSRV_DT ,D.TZ_TP_CD ,D.RSRV_DTL_NO ,U.USR_ID ,U.CPHN ,H.VST_NO ,C.VST_NO as CVST_NO ,C.FCLT_CHK_NO FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV R INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D on D.RSRV_NO = R.RSRV_NO INNER JOIN TB_USR U on R.USR_NO = U.USR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_VST_HIST H on H.RSRV_DTL_NO = D.RSRV_DTL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FCLT_CHK C on C.VST_NO = H.VST_NO WHERE D.RSRV_DTL_NO = #{reserveDetailNo} AND R.RSRV_NO = #{reserveNo}
